summary: Adds three sets of armor and a glowing eye to Skyrim. Inspired by the Thief games.
descriptionHtml:
This little mod adds 3 armor sets to the Ragged Flagon ( Search for a barrel in front of Tonilia's " shop" area ), two inspired by the Thief
series and my personnal Skyrim Outfit ( minus my red scarf ;) ! ). I
also added a glowing blue eye similar to Garrett's magic eye in the
Thief reboot.

If I ever manage to re-install 3Ds Max, I'll most probably add more armors, but for now, the mod is more or less complete.

This mod contains a texture set given to me by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/155768]PhOrce [/url]quite a long time ago. As you can guess, he gave permission to release it XD !
author: FafnirEtherion
